description: Trail to Silver Peak..highest point in Ontario
directions:
Head to Killarney by going up Hwy 69...turning left at hwy 637...well before Sudbury
 Ed: Approximately 40km South of Sudbury on Hiway 69, look for Hiway 637 going West to Killarney.  Drive 36.7km West and look for the road to Bell Lake / Brush Camp Lake / Silver Peak.  (If you get to Killarney you've gone 30.8km too far West)  Drive 8km North on this road to parking area.
title: La Cloche Silver Peak
